title: IDEA FEST for Fund 6 + 7
description: There is a lack of interaction between proposers and voters in Project Catalyst

title: Catalyst Virtual Start-up Bootcamp
description: Early-stage entrepreneurs lack the experience with Catalyst to effectively communicate their projects

title: Copy writing for DLT Entrepreneurs
description: Being able to communicate an idea and guide a reader to take the action you want them to is one of the most valuable skills in business.

title: Scale up WADA's Outreach Program
description: African devs and entrepreneurs lack support to submit high quality proposals into project catalyst

title: Community-Made Interactive Guides
description: Inexperienced entrepreneurs are not given a clear path for how to transform their ideas into businesses.

title: Catalyst Entrepreneur's Book Club
description: There is a large amount of valuable information to teach powerful entrepreneurial skills, but many people don't know where to look or start.

title: AntFarm
description: People need encouragement 2 submit ideas. We will host info sessions prior 2 fund launch & connect with all idea makers to offer free help.

title: Open Source Training
description:
No open-source training materials in the Entrepreneurship-Toolbox.

No access to open-source infrastructure for early stage entrepreneurs.

title: Library of Proposer Case Studies
description: Communicating ideas to a crowd is intimidating if you have not seen others do it well & know how it worked out for them.

title: Helix Hub Impact Accelerator
description: over 42% of early stage ventures identify "the lack of a market need for their product" as the single biggest reason for failure

title: PACE: Idea collaboration tool
description: Quality proposals require ideas which have had sufficient thought, feedback and the right team to execute

title: Proposal Framework Tool - AIM
description: Creating robust Catalyst proposals should be easier. +75% proposals don't win Catalyst funds costing assessors + proposers time + resources.

title: Entrepreneur Community Mentoring
description: Early entrepreneurs have difficulties communicating and developing a profitable business model for Catalyst proposals.

title: Growthwheel Business Planning Tool
description: Proposers must show assessors & voters an auditable  business plan, but most do not have business planning experience.

title: Cardano roadmap to adoption
description: Startup teams cannot properly showcase projects and ideas to those that do not understand blockchain technology

title: Tutorchain.io - for Entrepreneurs
description: Finding an expert or monetizing your expertise requires centralized vetting services that limit your choices and control your access.

title: Mini Proposals as a Service
description: Proposers don't know how to make their proposals understandable for voters

title: TrillionCoin Global Charity Token
description: Because of the Covid pandemic, there is a great need to help others. How can the need be filled in a way that helps people on a grand scale?

title: Proposal Templates + Guidelines
description: Creating proposals is difficult. How can we help entrepreneurs to best present their ideas to have the optimal chance of success w/ voters?

title: Bond - Connecting entrepreneurs
description: Connecting all things local. Empowering local businesses & communities to increase loyalty on a digital platform using virtual coins.

title: CARDANO Branding In Indonesia
description: Many people in Indonesia do not know about blockchain let alone Cardano. Misleading people is the method used by many scammers in Indonesia.

title: Intellectual Property Training
description: Early stage innovators often misunderstand Intellectual Property or Intangible Assets. This results in under use of innovator IP/IA.

title: Submission templates and examples
description: inexperienced entrepreneurs may not have adequate examples of what good looks like
